resources.string: Vic Fangio was the head coach of the Denver Broncos when they beat the Carolina Panthers in Super Bowl 50.
Super Bowl LI, featuring the Atlanta Falcons and New England Patriots, was the first Super Bowl that went to overtime.
The New England Patriots beat the Philadelphia Eagles to win Super Bowl LII.
Tom Brady was awarded the Super Bowl MVP Award for Super Bowl LIII after the New England Patriots beat the Los Angeles Rams.
The Kansas City Chiefs beat the San Francisco 49ers to win Super Bowl LIV.
The Tampa Bay Buccaneers beat the Kansas City Chiefs to win Super Bowl LV.
Are you sure you want to do this?
